name: com.unity.ide.neovim
description: The Neovim Editor package provides an integration for using the Neovim with omnisharp lsp as a code editor for Unity. It adds support for generating .csproj files and open files with nvr. Nevoim Editor package is a fork of the Rider Editor package that you can find here: "https://github.com/needle-mirror/com.unity.ide.rider".
